resources.string: Shakespearean Hangman tests your knowledge of Shakespeare\'s poems and plays, from the most famous to the most obscure. Play alone or compete in a six-game tournament with a friend.\nCreators: Matt Hendrickson, Cassie Schwendiman, and Katherine Thayer

"Shakespeare Cobbe portrait detail" by Unknown; photo by Lefteris Pitarakis/Associated Press - http://thelede.blogs.nytimes.com/2009/03/09/portrait-of-shakespeare-unveiled-399-years-late/?hp.
